titles.title: Better Care for PFAS Patients Act of 2024
Better Care for PFAS Patients Act of 2024
A bill to provide for the periodic issuance of up-to-date clinical guidance on addressing the health effects of per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS), and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
